an10.46:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
an10.46:1.2: Atha kho sambahula sakka upasaka tadahuposathe yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho sakke upasake bhagava etadavoca:
an10.46:1.3: “api nu tumhe, sakka, atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasatha”ti?
an10.46:1.4: “Appekada mayam, bhante, atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasama, appekada na upavasama”ti.
an10.46:1.5: “Tesam vo, sakka, alabha tesam dulladdham, ye tumhe evam sokasabhaye jivite maranasabhaye jivite appekada atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasatha, appekada na upavasatha.
an10.46:2.2: idha puriso yena kenaci kammatthanena anapajja akusalam divasam addhakahapanam nibbiseyya.
an10.46:3.2: idha puriso yena kenaci kammatthanena anapajja akusalam divasam kahapanam nibbiseyya.
an10.46:4.2: idha puriso yena kenaci kammatthanena anapajja akusalam divasam dve kahapane nibbiseyya …
an10.46:5.2: api nu so puriso divase divase kahapanasatam kahapanasahassam nibbisamano laddham laddham nikkhipanto vassasatayuko vassasatajivi mahantam bhogakkhandham adhigaccheyya”ti?
an10.46:6.2: api nu so puriso bhogahetu bhoganidanam bhogadhikaranam ekam va rattim ekam va divasam upaddham va rattim upaddham va divasam ekantasukhappatisamvedi vihareyya”ti?
an10.46:6.5: “Kama hi, bhante, anicca tuccha musa mosadhamma”ti.
an10.46:7.1: “Idha pana vo, sakka, mama savako dasa vassani appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto yatha mayanusittham tatha patipajjamano satampi vassani satampi vassasatani satampi vassasahassani ekantasukhappatisamvedi vihareyya.
an10.46:7.2: So ca khvassa sakadagami va anagami va apannakam va sotapanno.
an10.46:8.9: ekam vassam appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto yatha mayanusittham tatha patipajjamano satampi vassani satampi vassasatani satampi vassasahassani ekantasukhappatisamvedi vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadagami va anagami va apannakam va sotapanno.
an10.46:9.1: Idha mama savako dasa mase appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto yatha mayanusittham tatha patipajjamano satampi vassani satampi vassasatani satampi vassasahassani ekantasukhappatisamvedi vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadagami va anagami va apannakam va sotapanno.
an10.46:10.10: addhamasam appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto yatha mayanusittham tatha patipajjamano satampi vassani satampi vassasatani satampi vassasahassani ekantasukhappatisamvedi vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadagami va anagami va apannakam va sotapanno.
an10.46:11.1: Idha mama savako dasa rattindive appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto yatha mayanusittham tatha patipajjamano satampi vassani satampi vassasatani satampi vassasahassani ekantasukhappatisamvedi vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadagami va anagami va apannakam va sotapanno.
an10.46:12.9: ekam rattindivam appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto yatha mayanusittham tatha patipajjamano satampi vassani satampi vassasatani satampi vassasahassani ekantasukhappatisamvedi vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadagami va anagami va apannakam va sotapanno.
an10.46:12.10: Tesam vo, sakka, alabha tesam dulladdham, ye tumhe evam sokasabhaye jivite maranasabhaye jivite appekada atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasatha, appekada na upavasatha”ti.
an10.46:12.11: “Ete mayam, bhante, ajjatagge atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasissama”ti.
